text: The Boxtrolls is a 2014 American stop-motion animated fantasy comedy film by Laika. ==Cast== * Isaac Hempstead-Wright as Eggs * Elle Fanning as Winnie Portley-Rind * Ben Kingsley as Archibald Snatcher * Dee Bradley Baker as Fish / Wheels / Bucket * Toni Collette as Lady Cynthia Portley-Rind * Jared Harris as Lord Portley-Rind * Nick Frost as Mr. Trout * Richard Ayoade as Mr. ==Overview== An orphaned boy raised by underground creatures called Boxtrolls comes up from the sewers and out of his box to save his family and the town from the evil exterminator, Archibald Snatcher. Category:2014 movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies
title: The Boxtrolls
